name: Burning Fury
description:
Burning Fury is an Arcade Beat'em up where you make your way through the company you once worked for by beating all of your former co-workers. Release all your inner fury, let them know who's Boss.

Lore:

- This is the story of Roy. He has been working for a long time in the same job. He is like a slave to the company working day and night. 

- One day the company had to downsize to save money or that is what Roy was told.

- In the end, he was the only one who got fired, after all these years of hard work, he did not receive any gratitude at all, not even a thank-you letter. 

- That pissed him off, A LOT. Thus awakening his BURNING FURY.

Project made by students from Aula Arcade.
